## Have you already tried Rugby doctor?
Use `rugby doctor` as a self-diagnostic tool.

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See an error

## Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
